text: Along These Lines is a 1974 Canadian short documentary film directed by Peter Pearson."These Lines only Canadian film in N.Y. fest". That's Showbusiness, October 9, 1974. A history of the telephone, the film was sponsored by Bell Canada to mark the 100th anniversary of the telephone's invention by Alexander Graham Bell in 1874. It won the Canadian Film Award for Best Theatrical Short Film at the 26th Canadian Film Awards.Maria Topalovich, And the Genie Goes To...: Celebrating 50 Years of the Canadian Film Awards.
